gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.content: Start by completing your business profile. This helps us provide personalized recommendations for your industry and company size.

understandingTariffs.title: Understanding Tariffs
understandingTariffs.content: Tariffs are taxes on imported goods. They can significantly impact your product costs. Our platform helps you identify and mitigate these costs.

roiCalculator.title: ROI Calculator
roiCalculator.content: Use our calculator to understand the potential return on investment of optimizing your supply chain and tariff strategy.

hsCodes.title: What are HS Codes?
hsCodes.content: Harmonized System (HS) codes classify internationally traded products. Each product has a specific code that determines tariff rates.

costImpact.title: Cost Impact
costImpact.content: Tariffs are added to the cost of your imported goods. A 10% tariff on a $1000 product adds $100 to your cost.

contact.contactInfo: Contact us at support@smbtariffsuite.com or use live chat for immediate assistance.

welcome.title: Welcome to SMB Tariff Suite
welcome.content: We're your all-in-one platform for navigating tariff challenges. We'll help you optimize costs and reduce compliance risks.

profile.title: Start with Your Profile
profile.content: Complete your business profile to receive personalized recommendations based on your industry, size, and target markets.

identify.title: Identify Tariff Impacts
identify.content: Use our AI tools to automatically classify your products and identify potential tariff impacts.

action.title: Take Action
action.content: Implement our recommendations to optimize your supply chain and reduce tariff costs.

businessContext.whatThisMeans: What this means for your business:

tooltips.productsAffected: Number of products in your catalog that are subject to import tariffs
tooltips.potentialSavings: Estimated annual savings through supply chain optimization and tariff strategy
tooltips.complianceScore: Measure of how well your company complies with current trade regulations
tooltips.tariffRate: Percentage tax applied to the value of imported goods
tooltips.hsCode: 6-10 digit code used to classify internationally traded products
tooltips.supplierRisk: Assessment of risk associated with geographic concentration of suppliers
tooltips.diversificationScore: Measure of how diversified your supply chain is
tooltips.roiProjection: Estimated return on investment based on projected cost savings

actionableInsights.highTariffProducts: Consider alternative sources for these products or explore available trade exemptions.
actionableInsights.supplierConcentration: Diversifying suppliers across multiple countries can significantly reduce tariff risk.
actionableInsights.complianceGaps: Addressing these compliance issues can prevent costly delays and penalties.
actionableInsights.costOptimization: Implementing these recommendations could save your company $X-$Y annually.
actionableInsights.riskMitigation: These changes would reduce your tariff risk exposure by X%.
